mbr

Introduction

mbr (pronounced MBR) is an R package of utility functions and virtual classes for the model builder family of R packages.

Currently there are packages which implement the functionality for JAGS (jmbr), STAN (smbr) and TMB (tmbr).

Demonstration

library(magrittr)
library(ggplot2)
library(mbr)

Installation

To install from GitHub

# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("poissonconsulting/mbr")

Contribution

Please report any issues.

Pull requests are always welcome.

Please note that this project is released with a Contributor Code of Conduct. By participating in this project you agree to abide by its terms.
